ygData.subject: Dwarven Paladin Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all, I was wondering whether or not the dwarf paladin guildmasters will train me.  I m a half-elf based out of Freeport, so its not too hard for me
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all,

I was wondering whether or not the dwarf paladin guildmasters will train
me. I'm a half-elf based out of Freeport, so its not too hard for me to
come over to Kaladim. However, if I'm there, I would like to be able to
train if I have to. I was over there when I was level 8 or so, and the
dwarf I talked to told me he would have nothing to do with me. If
there's another guilmaster that I missed, please let me know. If anyone
ever wants to go out adventuring, I play on the Karana server and can be
currently found in Riverval. Farewell

Valandil
